name: Mr & Mrs Pie
description:
Mr & Mrs Pie is a 2D platform game with puzzle elements. 

Mr & Mrs Pie is about a couple looking for their missing daughter. They need to work together to collect candles that will guide their child home. Each character interacts differently with the platforms according to colour.

This is a first playable of the first level. The control button hasn't been implemented yet.

Jump: Space bar

Move left/right: arrows or wasd keys
